channel.title: Martial Arts on juri.strumpflohner
channel.description: Recent content in Martial Arts on juri.strumpflohner

item.title: Just before the sunrise on the beach at Rhodos...
Finally, my Katana arrived!!
item.description: Not the usual technical post :). Finally on Thursday this week my new katana arrived. It's exactly the one you see on the image. I had already one before, but now I bought a professional one.

item.title: Beside hacking each day...
item.description: ...at the computer, I recently started a non-computer-science-related project :) , one where I was able to refresh a little my mechanical skills :) Already for a longer time now I had the need for a Katana stand.

item.title: Stage with Kaiso Hiroo Mochizuki
item.description: As mentioned I've been practicing Yoseikan already for 9 years now. Usually once per month we meet at Brunico for the Yudansha Kai, where we train together with Roman Patuzzi, a direct student of Yoseikan founder Hiroo Mochizuki.

item.title: Qi Gong
item.description: Last week tuesday was my birthday and I received a nice set of "Qi Gong" balls (see picture) from my girlfriend. As somebody may have read , I practice Yoseikan Budo already for a longer time.

item.title: The first step in a long way....
item.description: I've always been a sporty person :). Already in elementary school I started to play soccer in a team, which I played for about nine years.
